==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a broom with bristles on top and tied handle on the bottom.

In modern form, top now resembles {{m|mul|聿||hand|sc=Hani}}, {{m|mul|肀||brush|sc=Hani}}, [[彐]], and overall graphically decomposes roughly as {{Han compound|肀|冖|巾}}.
